title: SCADA & Infrastructure Uplift
description: Led end-to-end transformation of critical water infrastructure monitoring systems
shortDescription: Modernized legacy SCADA systems for improved operational efficiency and real-time monitoring
challenge: Legacy SCADA systems required modernization to improve operational efficiency and real-time monitoring capabilities across water infrastructure
action: Facilitated stakeholder workshops, mapped current-state processes, designed future-state architecture, and coordinated agile delivery across multiple teams
impact: Improved system reliability by 40%, reduced response times to critical alerts, and enabled predictive maintenance capabilities

title: AI in Supply Chain Optimization
description: Delivered AI-powered platforms for demand forecasting and sales optimization across retail and manufacturing clients
shortDescription: Built AI platforms that improved forecast accuracy and reduced inventory waste for major clients
challenge: Clients needed accurate demand forecasting and sales optimization to reduce waste and increase profitability across complex supply chains
action: Conducted discovery sessions, defined business requirements, collaborated with data scientists on algorithm design, and managed UAT processes
impact: Achieved 15-25% improvement in forecast accuracy, $2M+ in cost savings for key clients, and 30% reduction in inventory waste

title: Real Estate AI Chatbot
description: Built intelligent chatbot for real estate lead management and customer engagement
shortDescription: Developed conversational AI that transformed real estate lead qualification and customer support
challenge: Real estate agents needed automated lead qualification and 24/7 customer support to improve conversion rates and response times
action: Defined conversation flows, created user stories, collaborated with developers on NLP integration, and conducted extensive testing
impact: Increased lead conversion by 35%, reduced response time to under 2 minutes, and improved customer satisfaction scores

title: Scaling a Digital Startup
description: Transformed startup operations through digital processes and automation
shortDescription: Helped scale a food delivery startup by implementing digital processes and operational frameworks
challenge: Fast-growing startup needed structured processes, automated workflows, and scalable systems to handle rapid expansion
action: Designed operational frameworks, implemented digital workflows, established KPI tracking, and created scalable business processes
impact: Enabled 300% business growth, reduced operational costs by 25%, and improved order processing efficiency by 60%
